public class Game extends Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(String name, Map map, List<Player> players, List<Color> colors, Player firstPlayer, boolean original)
      Constructor to make a new Game
      Parameters:
      name - the name of this Game
      map - the map that this Game will use
      players - the players who will be playing the game
      colors - the colors of the players who will be playing this Game
      firstPlayer - the Player who will play first
